articles.content: When the iPhone 12 series was introduced, special attention was given to the iPhone 12 mini. Finally, people who wanted a smaller form factor had a device that didnt compromise on performance. But no… [+1779 chars]

articles.title: UPDATE 1-Apple partners with TSMC to develop ultra-advanced displays - Nikkei - Reuters
articles.description: Apple Inc has partnered with Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co to develop micro OLED displays, which it plans to use in its upcoming augmented reality (AR) devices, Nikkei Asia reported on Wednesday.
